project1.title: Robo Romp
project1.description: A code challenge to learn JS prototypal inheritance turned side project. Duke it out against a friend in a Mortal Kombat themed robot frenzy!
project1.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Prototypal JS, Task Automation, Animate.css, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Local Weather
project2.description: An assignment that mixed the excitement of weather forecasts, API's and Firebase authentication. Hold onto your hats!
project2.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, OpenWeather API, Firebase, Task Automation, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Chatter Cheese
project3.description: A group project to showcase our skills after three months at the Nashville Software School. Colorful language strongly encouraged.
project3.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, OpenWeather API, Firebase, Task Automation, Version Control with Github
